Key Match Events: The match was called off due to incessant rains at MCG, with both teams sharing a point each.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan lost their first match to England before their next game against New Zealand was washed out due to rain, leaving them in a tricky spot.
Ireland recorded a stunning win over England in their second match of the Super 12, leaving the Group 1 wide open.
Post-Match Reflections: The Afghanistan players were visibly disappointed as it was the second time they hadn't been able to step on the field in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022, Super 12 Group A.
Ireland are currently on the fourth position with two points, while Afghanistan are at the bottom-most position with only one point from two games.
